name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Metals
description: This is a repository of metals APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Xignite
apis.description: Financial market data on-demand. Xignite financial Web services help build smarter websites and applications in minutes with zero up-front investment.
